abstract: NBA players reject commissioner David Stern's threat to cancel games through Christmas if there is no breakthrough in scheduled meeting with a federal mediator.
snippet: Washington center JaVale McGee denied a comment he made after leaving a union meeting early, notably that he reportedly said some players were ready to fold.
lead_paragraph: Washington center JaVale McGee denied a comment he made after leaving a union meeting early, notably that he reportedly said some players were ready to fold.

headline.main: N.B.A. Players Union Fights Off Impression That It Isn’t United
headline.print_headline: Union Fights Off Impression That It Isn’t United
headline.seo: N.B.A. Players Union Fights Off Impression That It Isn’t United
